title: "Commenting too quickly, try again later."
body: This honestly makes no sense. What if I see multiple comments or threads right next to each other which have legitimate queries that I feel like I can legitimately help with?

replies.body: Surely there is a way to differentiate

I think you should wait a bit or tomorrow to comment or try using other devices. :)

Answer my question if you can:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/HMni1EYq-ranking-help
I actually did but I don't think it went through
